content:
I know it is Summertime for many people, so maybe there is no August release? But just wondered when we should expect 4.22 to appear? Thanks

(If it's beginning of Sept, that is fine too - then I don't need to keep coming back to check github:)

Thank you!! So mid-month means should be happening in some days time, cool!

Though that change seems news-worthy enough to be it's own announcement (-:
